events.message: Applicant John Doe submitted a personal loan application to cover unexpected medical expenses.
Loan application was reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan due to medical expense reason stated.
Loan officer Sarah Lee was assigned to manage the personal loan application for the applicant.
Initial review completed focusing on applicant’s income and medical bills documentation submitted so far.
Additional documents requested including recent pay stubs and detailed medical invoices for better assessment.
Applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including employer letters and hospital fee statements.
Credit check completed with satisfactory credit score, showing responsible borrowing history.
Risk assessment completed indicating moderate risk primarily associated with current medical debts.
Personal loan offer was presented to applicant including detailed terms, repayment schedule, and interest rates.
Applicant provided feedback expressing satisfaction with terms and requested a slight extension on repayment period.
Application escalated to senior loan committee for review of requested repayment extension by the applicant.
Senior committee approved the personal loan and accepted the applicant’s request for a repayment extension.
Loan amount was successfully funded and transferred to the applicant’s designated bank account.
Follow-up call conducted to ensure applicant understands repayment schedule and offers support for any issues.
Personal loan application process successfully closed after all formalities and documentation were completed.
